name: Community Takeover
description: Our aim is to act as a lifeline for dormant communities and a vehicle for aspiring memecoin creators. Should a community seek revival or a creator wish to launch successfully, WE would be their premier choice. Our mission is to shield them from falling victim to influencers who charge exorbitant fees for minimal promotion, only to abandon them after seeing some profit. In contrast, by turning to us, they will find a hoard of dedicated and ecstatic degens ready to guide them every step of the way and advise them on what links NOT to press kekek. What does this mean for $CT holders? An excellent question. $CT holders will benefit from early access to revitalized memecoins from the communities we assist, as well as exclusive presales and airdrops from the new tokens we advise. Community members will also be in-the-know regarding all things crypto and receive top tier alpha from industry vets. Our approach will position $CT as a powerhouse, poised to become a trusted launchpad within the memecoin market and a lighthouse of reliability amidst a sea of rug pulls and scams.
